price: (11) Say, "Travel through the land; then observe how was the end of the deniers."
arabic: قُلۡ سِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ثُمَّ ٱنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qul sīrū fī al-arḍi thumma unẓurū kayfa kāna ʿāqibatu al-mukadhibīna
